mapper.update: UPDATE TRADE SET TRD_MAX = #{trd_max, jdbcType=INTEGER}, TRD_STATUS = #{trd_status, jdbcType=INTEGER}, TRD_ENDDATE = #{trd_enddate,jdbcType=DATE}, TRD_COST = #{trd_cost, jdbcType=INTEGER}, REG_ID = #{reg_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, TRD_LOC = #{trd_loc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRD_GENDER = #{trd_gender, jdbcType=INTEGER}, TRD_MINAGE = #{trd_minage, jdbcType=INTEGER}, TRD_MAXAGE = #{trd_maxage, jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE TRD_ID = #{trd_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TRADE WHERE TRD_ID = (SELECT TRD_ID FROM ARTICLE WHERE ART_ID = #{art_id} AND BRD_ID = #{brd_id})
